name: Sweets Ring
description: Created in just under 3 months as part of a school project, Sweets Ring puts you in the shoes of a new student at Enbridge University. A private boarding school that is top of the line in every regard. However, Enbridge has one simple rule that makes their student's lives anything but sweet. Ask yourself, should you obey every command given to you by your higher ups, no matter how stupid? Or should you rebel against asinine rules, no matter the cost?
